entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
